com.joliciel.talismane.rawText

Class OtherWhiteSpaceFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.rawText.RawTextRegexAnnotator
      • com.joliciel.talismane.rawText.OtherWhiteSpaceFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Annotator<AnnotatedText>, RawTextAnnotator

    public class OtherWhiteSpaceFilter
extends RawTextRegexAnnotator
    Replaces any whitespace characters (including tabs) by a standard whitespace.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
